name: codey Search
description: A lightweight, privacy-oriented, containerized Google search proxy for desktop/mobile that removes Javascript, AMP links, tracking, and ads/sponsored content

codey_USER.description: The username for basic auth. codey_PASS must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

codey_PASS.description: The password for basic auth. codey_USER must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

codey_PROXY_USER.description: The username of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

codey_PROXY_PASS.description: The password of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

codey_PROXY_TYPE.description: The type of the proxy server. For example "socks5". Leave empty to disable.

codey_PROXY_LOC.description: The location of the proxy server (host or ip). Leave empty to disable.

codey_ALT_TW.description: The site to use as a replacement for twitter.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

codey_ALT_YT.description: The site to use as a replacement for youtube.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

codey_ALT_IG.description: The site to use as a replacement for instagram.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

codey_ALT_RD.description: The site to use as a replacement for reddit.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

codey_ALT_TL.description: The Google Translate alternative to use for all searches following the 'translate ___' structure.

codey_CONFIG_COUNTRY.description: [CONFIG] The country to use for restricting search results (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/codey-search/develop/app/static/settings/countries.json)

codey_CONFIG_LANGUAGE.description: [CONFIG] The language to use for the interface (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/codey-search/develop/app/static/settings/languages.json)

codey_CONFIG_SEARCH_LANGUAGE.description: [CONFIG] The language to use for search results (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/codey-search/develop/app/static/settings/languages.json)

codey_CONFIG_DISABLE.description: [CONFIG] Disable ability for client to change config (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_BLOCK.description: [CONFIG] Block websites from search results (comma-separated list)

codey_CONFIG_SAFE.description: [CONFIG] Use safe mode for searches (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_ALTS.description: [CONFIG] Use social media alternatives (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_TOR.description: [CONFIG] Use Tor, if available (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_NEW_TAB.description: [CONFIG] Always open results in new tab (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_VIEW_IMAGE.description: [CONFIG] Enable View Image option (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_GET_ONLY.description: [CONFIG] Search using GET requests only (set to 1 or leave blank)

codey_CONFIG_STYLE.description: [CONFIG] Custom CSS styling (paste in CSS or leave blank)
